overview.default: Azure OpenAI Service provides REST API access to OpenAI's powerful language models including the GPT-4, GPT-4 Turbo with Vision, GPT-3.5-Turbo, and Embeddings model series. For more information, see the [Azure OpenAI Service documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/overview).
